mapper.insert: insert into orders values(#{order_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{order_name}, sysdate, sysdate + INTERVAL '12' MONTH, #{order_pcode}, #{receiver}, #{receiver_tel}, #{order_addr}, #{order_detail}, #{order_msg}, #{using_point}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 7, 'DD'), 'DD'), 1, 1, sysdate, #{order_tos})
mapper.select: select count(*) from orders o JOIN order_pro op ON o.order_idx = op.order_idx JOIN product p ON op.pro_idx = p.pro_idx WHERE o.user_idx = #{user_idx} and o.order_status=4

select * from (select rownum as rnum, e.*from( SELECT *FROM orders o JOIN order_pro op ON o.order_idx = op.order_idx JOIN product p ON op.pro_idx = p.pro_idx WHERE o.user_idx = #{user_idx} and o.order_status=5 and o.order_status=6 and o.order_status=7 order by order_date desc )e )f where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}

select count(*) from orders o JOIN order_pro op ON o.order_idx = op.order_idx JOIN product p ON op.pro_idx = p.pro_idx WHERE o.user_idx = #{user_idx} and o.order_status=5 and o.order_status=6 and o.order_status=7

select * from (select rownum as rnum, e.*from( select a.order_idx, d.pro_name, b.pro_amount, c.user_name, c.user_tel, a.amount, a.order_status, a.order_date, a.receiver, a.receiver_tel, a.order_msg, (a.order_pcode||' '||a.order_addr||' '||a.order_detail) ship_addr from orders a, order_pro b, member c, product d where a.order_idx=b.order_idx and b.pro_idx=d.pro_idx and b.user_idx=c.user_idx and b.user_idx=#{user_idx} )e )f where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
